gsp = self.make_gsp({})
b, ind = gsp.nearest_neighbors(self.centres, n=self.n_nearest)
for i in range(len(b)):
    assert_equal(sorted(b[i]), b[i])
gsp = self.make_gsp({(0): (-self.lbox * 0.5, self.lbox * 0.5)})
b, ind = gsp.nearest_neighbors(self.centres, n=self.n_nearest)
for i in range(len(b)):
    assert_equal(sorted(b[i]), b[i])
